sentence: The worst election integrity' governor in the country, Brian Kemp, loaded the great state of Georgia up with RINOs,? Mr. Trump said in a statement on Wednesday, using the term for Republicans in name only.? That tells you all you need to know about what you are getting in Georgia just a continuation of bad elections and a real RINO if you vote for Brian Kemp.? Mr. Christie, who has publicly rebuked Mr. Trump for failing to produce evidence of a stolen election, mocked the former president's statement and said he was proud to support Mr. Kemp.
title: Corman endorses Barletta for governor in Pennsylvania, as Republicans step up their effort to halt Mastriano.
